biotools.summary: Workflow which can implement a set of RNA-Seq analysis, such as performing quality control (QC) for sequencing data, generating signal tracks of mapped reads, calculating expression levels, and identifying differentially expressed genes by just providing sequencing RNA-Seq datasets.

bioschemas.name: RseqFlow
